name: places/ChIJF2vq3odYwokRaYbMpZMntCs
formattedAddress: 401 West End Ave #1, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 401 West End Ave #1, New York, NY 10024-5724, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Schrott is such a nice, gentle, and caring dentist! He was very clear on what he planned on doing during the routine and was very informational on any issues I had with my teeth. He was the only dentist that pointed out my abfractions and fixed them! He flawlessly filled in the abfractions and blended them seamlessly, you couldn't even tell I had any abfraction issues in the first place. His attention to detail is amazing and I highly recommend visiting him if you are looking for a dentist! He also plays calming jazz music during your appointment which makes the whole experience even better.

originalText.text: Had my first appointment with Dr. Schrott today for exam and cleaning. Not only is he a great dentist, but he is also the kindest, sweetest, compassionate and personable professional. I have never before left the office of a dentist in such a great mood. He patiently answered all of my questions and offered a good advice. He takes time to relate to his patients and makes them feel welcome and relaxed. His receptionist, Barbara, was also very nice and pleasant!

text.text: Had my first appointment with Dr. Schrott today for exam and cleaning. Not only is he a great dentist, but he is also the kindest, sweetest, compassionate and personable professional. I have never before left the office of a dentist in such a great mood. He patiently answered all of my questions and offered a good advice. He takes time to relate to his patients and makes them feel welcome and relaxed. His receptionist, Barbara, was also very nice and pleasant!

originalText.text: Excellent dentist. I found Dr. Schrott through Next Door reviews. It was my first time visiting for a check-up and cleaning, which he did with the utmost care and gentleness.  Dr. Schrott asked great questions, listened, and gave great advice. He won my trust. His office is zen. You feel like you're in a small town overlooking the trees on WestEndAve. I also had the pleasure of listening to jazz. My only regret is that I didn't find him sooner!

text.text: Excellent dentist. I found Dr. Schrott through Next Door reviews. It was my first time visiting for a check-up and cleaning, which he did with the utmost care and gentleness.  Dr. Schrott asked great questions, listened, and gave great advice. He won my trust. His office is zen. You feel like you're in a small town overlooking the trees on WestEndAve. I also had the pleasure of listening to jazz. My only regret is that I didn't find him sooner!

originalText.text:
Dr Schrott is the kindest and best dentist I’ve had in New York. I moved to New York 3 years ago and have had 4 different dentists. The other 3 seem to want you in and out as soon as possible. I found Dr Schrott and he’s such a wonderful kind man. He talks me through each stage of my procedures with a smile. I have always been nervous about visiting the dentist but since I sat in his chair I felt relaxed and as if I’m in good hands.

Couldn’t ask for a better man!

originalText.text:
Dr. Schrott is the kindest man and the most gentle dentist.
He was recommended to me by a friend and I will always recommend him to anyone looking for a fantastic dentist
